Predestined Event

A predestined event is some arbitrary movement of anicca and/or mana within a Creation, as defined by the will of those atman who had a part in its creation. It differs from an Internal Mechanism in that it is designed to deny or defeat atman agency, rather than encourage it. Still, predestined events are not above manipulation by a singular or collective of atman, just as any aspect of fate, even the lifespan of the Creation.
